|twitter = https://twitter.com/Markgatiss|First = "[[The Laws of Gods and Men]]"}}'''Mark Gatiss'''â€‹ (born 17 October, 1966) is an English actor, screenwriter and novelist. He plays the role of [[Tycho Nestoris]], an envoy from the [[Iron Bank of Braavos]], in the [[Season 4|fourth]] and [[Season 5|fifth]] seasons.<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2013/07/sherlock-actor-mark-gatiss-cast-in-season-4/ Winter Is Coming]</ref><ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/mark-gatiss-returning-game-thrones-season-5/]</ref>

He attendedÂ [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heighington_CE_Primary_School Heighington CE Primary School]Â andÂ [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Woodham_Community_Technology_College Woodham Comprehensive School]Â inÂ [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newton_Aycliffe Newton Aycliffe].<ref>[http://www.accessmylibrary.com/coms2/summary_0286-30117544_ITMÂ Remembering Heighington's past with pride - and looking to the future.]</ref>

Gatiss is best known as a writer and actor for his involvement in the TV series ''[[wikipedia:The League of Gentlemen|The League of Gentlemen]]'', ''[[wikipedia: Doctor Who|Doctor Who]]'' and ''[[wikipedia: Sherlock (TV series)|Sherlock]]''.
